Detailed Description

template<typename T, bool isNumber>
class isis::util::_internal::type_compare< T, isNumber >

Generic value comparison class for Value.

This generic class does nothing, and the ()-operator will allways fail with an error send to the debug-logging. It has to be (partly) specialized for the regarding type.
